content:
⚡ Reliance – The Wildcard

AGM highlights:
• 📡 Jio IPO planned for H1 CY26
• 🤖 Big bets on AI & New Energy

Yet stock fell ~2% on AGM day. Pattern repeats: post-AGM letdowns.

👉 With its heavy Nifty weight, RIL = key swing factor.
#Reliance⚡ #Nifty50📉

🏦 Bank Nifty Pressure

📉 August = -4%
⚠️ July’s Dark Cloud Cover confirmed in Aug
📊 Support: 53,600–53,500 → break = 52,400
📊 Resistance: 54,500–54,600

👉 Banks need >54,600 to bounce back.
#BankNifty🏦 #Markets📉

📉 August Wrap-Up
• Sensex: 79,809 (-270 pts)
• Nifty 50: 24,426 (-74 pts) → 3rd straight fall
• Reliance -2% post AGM (AI + Jio IPO buzz but market not impressed)

👉 Tariff jitters + weak sentiment = shaky start to Sept.
